commandlist:
* `+<search> query` - search using keywords (only in Bible Gateway versions)
* `+<setversion> ABBV` - set preferred version to ABBV
* `+<version>` - see what version you've set
* `+<versions>` - see the supported versions
* `+<versioninfo> VER` - read information about a version, using the acronym
* `+<random>` - get a random Bible verse
* `+<verseoftheday>` (`+<votd>`) - get the verse of the day
* `+<headings> <enable>/<disable>` - enable or disable topic headings
* `+<versenumbers> <enable>/<disable>` - enable or disable verse numbers
* `+<language>` - see your current language, if one is set (default: english)
* `+<setlanguage> LANG` - set preferred language to LANG
* `+<languages>` - see the supported languages
* `+<users>` - list all users throughout all servers (not counting duplicates or bots)
* `+<servers>` - show how many servers BibleBot is in
* `+<invite>` - get the invite link for BibleBot
* `+<supporters>` - the supporters of BibleBot
usage: 이 봇을 사용하려면 성경 구절을 입력하십시오. 나머지는 내가 다룰거야.
versionused: 당신이 사용하고있는 <version>. 소용 `+<setversion>` 다른 버전을 설정합니다.
noversionused: 데이터베이스에서 이름을 찾지 못했습니다. `<setversion>` 을 아직 사용 했습니까?
languageused: You are using Language. Use `+<setlanguage>` to set a different language.
nolanguageused: I couldn't find your name in my database, have you used `+<setlanguage>` yet?
otnotsupported: The version <version> doesn't support the Old Testament.
ntnotsupported: The version <version> doesn't support the New Testament.
deunotsupported: The version <version> doesn't support the Apocrypha/Deuterocanon.
otnotsupported2: If you want to use the Old Testament, `+<setversion>` to a version that has it.
ntnotsupported2: If you want to use the New Testament, `+<setversion>` to a version that has it.
deunotsupported2: If you want to use the Apocrypha/Deuterocanon, `+<setversion>` to a version that has it.
passagetoolong: The passage is too long for me to grab, sorry.
votdcantprocess: Today's VOTD can't be processed, see <https://www.biblegateway.com/> for the VOTD.
versioninfo:
**<versionname>**

Contains Old Testament: <hasOT>
Contains New Testament: <hasNT>
Contains Apocrypha/Deuterocanon: <hasDEU>
versioninfofailed: I couldn't find that version, are you sure you used the right acronym?
users: The number of users spanning across all servers that BibleBot is on (without duplicates)
queryTooShort: Your search query must be longer than 3 characters.
supporters: A special thank you to the following contributors:
